name: protocol
author: Mozilla
description: A design system for Mozilla's websites.

scripts.build-docs: npm ci && npm run lint && webpack --config webpack.docs.static.config.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.docs.build.config.js --mode production && fractal build
scripts.build-package: npm ci && npm run lint && webpack --config webpack.package.static.config.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.package.build.config.js --mode production
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-css
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run test-build
scripts.test: npx jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs --config=tests/jasmine-browser.json && npx jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs --browser=chrome --config=tests/jasmine-browser.json
scripts.webpack: npm run lint && webpack --config webpack.docs.static.config.js --mode development && webpack --config webpack.docs.build.config.js --watch --mode development
